articles.content: After around 30 years of existence, WordPad is finally saying goodbye. In the Windows 11 Build 26020 Insider Previews Canary Channel, Microsoft announced that WordPad will not be auto-installed after… [+2077 chars]

articles.author: Coco Liu
articles.title: The $200 Billion Video Game Industry Is a Climate Opportunity - Bloomberg
articles.description: Games are good at illustrating “this idea of progression,” says Deborah Mensah-Bonsu, founder of Games for Good, in a Q&A with Bloomberg Green .
articles.content: It begins with a disturbing scene: a city almost entirely underwater. The citys developers must reclaim land from the sea in order to build new infrastructure, but too much digging will trigger earth… [+489 chars]
